resources.string:
"Sound Notifications help you know what's happening in your home.

When Sound Notifications are on, your device will always be checking for sounds you want to be notified about, like when a smoke alarm beeps or baby cries.

Audio and background conversations aren't sent to Google, unless you choose to send feedback about sound quality."

Live Transcribe shows speech as text on your screen so you can participate in conversations around you more easily.

You can type responses on screen while viewing the transcription, get alerted when your name is spoken, and search within transcriptions.

Google processes your conversations but never stores them.
